Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.We are currently seeking an experienced professional to join the Mail Receiving Unit in Channel Services: Operations team.Principal ResponsibilitiesSupport all operational related activities pertaining to Liability and credit card statements by physical and emailing mode. This comprises, liaising with Print as well as Delivery Partners for E2E tracking of the deliverables.
Manage query resolutions and other requests received from business for the said deliverables.
Support control testing activities (Helios) which comprises of monthly reporting, evidencing basis the submission and activities done by the vendor. Moreover, conduct BCP testing annually as part of Business Continuity Plan.
Maintain & monitor inventories for Liability and Credit Card Statements related stationery and see to the procurement of the required the stationery in a  timely manner to avoid any stock-shortage situation.
Extend support to multiple LoB’s (WPB / WSP) for various ad-hoc request (i.e., may be due regulatory, re-engineering or new product launch).
Manage vendor invoices for the activities listed above.
Manage MRV desk as required.Job Details
